name: Work Through Time
description:
!DONT USE RESOLUTION BUTTONS THEY BROKE!

Short game with interesting and original mechanics for Brackeys Gamejam2020.2

First credits to Penguz for making music and Zakp for making second character art. Also thanks to my Twitch viewers:), Okay as you see i ran out of time and game became very short. I still hope you can enjoy it and see potential of those mechanics. I just wish i could use same method that game uses and go back in time. And i hope you undertsand controls, they are not hard....
